titles.title: Service Contract Threshold Increase Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Service Contract Act to increase the coverage threshold to $100,000 for non-military contracts and $1,000,000 for military contracts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 7/28/1987--Introduced. Service Contract Threshold Increase Act of 1987 - Amends the Service Contract Act of 1965 to increase the coverage threshold to $100,000 for non-military contracts and $1,000,000 for military contracts. Changes specified references to the Comptroller General to references to the Administrator of General Services.
